Creat 30/06/2017

This is a science mod which use the science of today and the science of the future, for the moment it is in Progress.

The download is a Beta. Actually their only one part which is Horloge Cezium 133 (Atomic Clock). Their a possible bug with the texture and I work on a other texture. In would like know if for you, there is the bug or not

 

Download From : https://spacedock.info/mod/1425/Kerbal Science Innovation

 

 

 

Licence:  Licence Creative Commons Attribution - Pas d’Utilisation Commerciale - Pas de Modification 3.0 France.

 

 

Edited June 30, 2017 by Ourshinigami

Congrats on release, just want to let you know you put it in the wrong section. Tools and Applications is for things that run outside of ksp. This should be in add-on releases or add-on development depending on how much work still needs to be done.

it is ok

 

Edited June 30, 2017 by Ourshinigami

Heh, best thing to do is report the thread and ask for it to be moved. I'll lock this one up, while you've already made a duplicate.

(To the person who reported this thread earlier: Sorry, it took a couple of hours for one of us to wake up.)
